# Sheet keys unifieddocument.sheet.description=This page controls how Unified Documents pages are displayed in both view and edit modes. unifieddocument.sheet.noObject=The current page doesn't have the expected Unified Documents object. unifieddocument.sheet.noFields=The Unified Documents application doesn't have any fields to display. unifieddocument.sheet.noSectionPublished=This section is not published.
